title: Album Review: 'Supernova'
teaser: Ray LaMontagne's last album earned him a Grammy, but his follow-up, Supernova, turns away from his usual folk and toward '60s-tinged rock. Reviewer Meredith Ochs found the change a pleasant surprise.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
